name: కాంతి నీడ Kanti Nida
description:
STORY

Are you afraid of the dark? You should be.

You're a young boy who is terribly scared of the dark: he feel the presence of his sister all around him, and each night "something" crawls out from his wardrobe and stares at him for hours. For the first time, one night, he decide to grab a torch and his favorite rubber sword to face his fears. Are you ready to jump into The Void?

---

కాంతి నీడ Kanti Nida is an action game with RPG elements: be ready to face many enemies as you travel between the light world and the shadow world to discover the truth about your sister and to face your deep fears.

---

MADE FOR IGMC 2017 WITH RPG MAKER MV

Team Linked Rooms

  • Marco "Ally" Camedda - Eventing, Scripting, Pixel art, Game Design
  • Simone "Macbeth" Granata - Mapping, Storywriting and Game Design
  • Davide "Mishima" Isimbaldi - Character design
  • Anthony "Chaucer" Padilla - Core scripting

Credits

  • Degica/Kadokawa - RPG Maker MV Engine
  • Galv, Moghunter, Khas, Soul - Plugins
